nodes.text: Further Conversations with Lanius is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on September 16, 2004 and included an interview of Lanius Qel-Bertuk by Yara Grugara on the state of affairs at the Almas Academy, oversight by the Coruscant Jedi Temple, and changes in Academy staff.
